entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of thundershowers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 22. Humidex 28. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 10.
